item.description: 由于投资者对美国债务拍卖和上月美联储会议纪要的期待，国债在经历了 4 月份以来最长的连续下跌后保持坚挺。【原文：Treasuries are holding their ground following the longest streak of declines since April as investors look ahead to a US debt auction and the minutes from last month’s Federal Reserve meeting.】
